badge.badgelb: Check the server's Leaderboard of Badges

music.Join: Summons the bot to a voice channel.
music.Leave: Clears the queue and leaves the voice channel.
music.Stop: Stops playing song and clears the queue.
music.Remove: Removes a song from the queue.
music.Loop: Loop or unloop the currently playing song.

misc.avatar: See the Profile Picture of the user.
misc.userbanner: See the Banner of the user.
misc.icon: See the Icon of the Server.
misc.banner: See the Banner of the Server.
misc.serverinfo: Get info and stats about the Server.

fun.8pool: Play 8Pool. See your Fortune or take advice.
fun.ladder: Get PS ladder information of a user.

pokedex.data: Get Information of a PokÃ©mon, Ability, Move, Item, or Nature.
pokedex.learn: Get Information of a PokÃ©mon Learnset.
pokedex.filter: Search PokÃ©mon based on user-inputted parameters.
pokedex.weak: Get Weakness of a PokÃ©mon or Types.
pokedex.sprite: Get Showdown Sprite of a PokÃ©mon.
pokedex.sets: Get Moveset of a PokÃ©mon from Smogon.

badges.des: View your (or someone else's) current Gym Badges of the server.
badges.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

gyms.des: View all the gyms with their leaders of the server.
gyms.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

sbadges.des: View all the badges available to the server.
sbadges.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

glrole.des: Set the Gym Leader role of the server. Members with this role can award or revoke badges.
glrole.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

elrole.des: Set the Elite role of the server. Members with this role can add or remove elite streaks.
elrole.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

badgen.des: Create a new badge for the server.
badgen.Syntax:
`{prefix}badgen [badge name] [symbol]`
Symbol can be an emoji or text. Recommended to use Emojis.
badgen.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

leaderadd.des:
Add Gym Leaders for the server, so other members can view them.
Must have added the Badge first using `badgen`.
leaderadd.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

leaderremove.des: Remove a previously added Gym Leader using `leaderadd`.
leaderremove.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

award.des: Award a Gym Badge to a Member. The command user must have any of the Gym Leader role or Manage Server Permission. If you are a Gym Leader, you don't have to mention the `badge`. It will add automatically
award.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

revoke.des: Remove a Gym Badge from a Member added previously. The command user must have any of the Gym Leader role or Manage Server Permission.
revoke.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

badgelb.des: View the Badge Leaderboard of the server. Shows top 10 Members with most badges.
badgelb.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

streaka.des: Increase Elite Streak of a Member by 1. The command user must have any of the Elite role or Manage Server Permission.
streaka.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

streakr.des: Remove all the Elite Streak gained by the Member. The command user must have any of the Elite role or Manage Server Permission.
streakr.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

badgereset.des: Reset the whole Badge System for the server. Member's Profile will be resetted, Gl and El Roles will be resetted, Gym Leaders will be resetted etc.
badgereset.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

gg.des: A basic text based Guessing Game. Predict a number between the range, if you guessed wrong, I will tell you weather to guess Higher or Lower
gg.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

tic-tac-toe.des: Play Tic Tac Toe with a server member. If no server member is available, you can play with me too, but it will be hard to defeat me.
tic-tac-toe.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

rock-paper-scissors.des: Play Rock Paper Scissors with me.
rock-paper-scissors.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

dex.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

move.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

item.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

nature.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

ability.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

data.des: Get Information of a PokÃ©mon, Ability, Move, Item, or Nature.
data.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

learn.des: Get Information of a PokÃ©mon Learnset, add optional move to show how that PokÃ©mon learns that move.
learn.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

filter.des: Search PokÃ©mon based on user-inputted parameters.
filter.Parameters:
**hp/hitpoints:** `hp=100 or hp>100 or hp<100`
**atk/attack:** `atk=100 or atk>100 or atk<100`
**def/defense:** `def=100 or def>100 or def<100`
**spa/specialattack:** `spa=100 or spa>100 or spa<100`
**spd/specialdefense:** `spd=100 or spd>100 or spd<100`
**spe/speed:** `spe=100 or spe>100 or spe<100`
**Ability:** `ability=flash fire`
**Move:** `move=lava plume`
**Type:** `type=fire or type=fire; steel`
For multiple value in type or move use parameter multiple times or separated by a `;`
filter.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

weak.des: Provides a Pokemon's or a type combination's resistances, weaknesses, and immunities, ignoring abilities. Limited to two types maximum and one type minimum.
weak.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

sprite.des: Image link of a PokÃ©mon. Uses PokemonShowdown's sprite library.
sprite.Filters:
**shiny:** Enables shiny variant.
**back:** Enables back variant.
**afd:** Enables April Fool's Day sprites.
**gen:** PokÃ©mon generation to parse with.
sprite.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

sets.des: Get MoveSet of a PokÃ©mon of preferred Generation and format from smogon. Default to Generation 8 if no generation is passed
sets.Syntax:
`{prefix}sets [pokemon] {gen}`
All generations available from RB(Gen 1) to SS(Gen 8)
sets.Uses:
{prefix}sets Heatran
{prefix}sets Mew gen6
{prefix}sets excadrill gen 5
{prefix}sets scizor sm
sets.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

roll.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

toss.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

urban.des: Search a word in Urban Dictionary. If you want meanings of the word, use the `dict` command instead.
urban.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

8pool.des: Play 8Pool. See your Fortune or take advice. Ask for a Yes/No answer type question.
8pool.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

poll.des: Create a Vote Poll with a question and options upto 20.
poll.Uses:
{preix}poll I am the best? // Yes, No
Atleast 2 options are needed for a valid Poll.
poll.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

showpoll.des: Shows Result of a Previously Created Poll.
showpoll.Uses: Message ID works only if the Poll is on same channel of using the command. For other Channels use Message Link.
showpoll.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

meme.des: Get a random Meme from r/Memes subreddit
meme.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

eval.des: Evaluate a PokÃ©mon Showdown Battle Replay. Get it's Format, Users, Winner and Ladder Update in a ranked battle.
eval.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.

ladder.des: Get all the ladder records of a user from PokÃ©mon Showdown.
ladder.footer: Argument in {} are Optional argument and in [] are required.
